content: dtr double treble_crochet yarn over x 3 times trtr triple treble_crochet yarn over x 4 times fp complete the stitch around the front post of the stitch indicated bp complete the stitch around the back post of the stitch indicated fp popcorn complete 4 fp double_crochet around the indicated stitch then drop the loop from the hook place the hook in the first stitch of the popcorn set grab the dropped loop and pull it through if round begins with popcorn crochet ch3 instead of first fp double_crochet in the set popcorn-a crochet tc into the stitch or space indicated complete 3 double_crochet in the first loop the base of tc then drop the loop from the hook place the hook in the first stitch of the popcorn set grab the dropped loop and pull it through if round begins with popcorn-a crochet ch4 instead of tc cluster holding back the last loop of all stitches in cluster set crochet 4 double_crochet into the stitch or space indicated then yarn over and pull through all loops on hook decrease holding back the last loop of all stitches in decrease set crochet the number of stitches into the stitches or spaces indicated then yarn over and pull through all loops on hook 0 magic_ring 8 half_double_crochet 1 chain 1 half_double_crochet chain 2 x 8 times in a ring join 8 spaces slip_stitch in next space chain 2 part of decrease 2 double_crochet is completed *chain 3 decrease 2 double_crochet in the same and next spaces* around to 8 decreases 2 complete the last decrease crochet the first part and join in the 8 spaces 2nd loop of the starting stitch slip_stitch in next space chain 2 part of decrease 2 double_crochet is completed 8 decreases *chain 2 cluster in the same space chain 2 decrease 2 double_crochet in the 3 8 clusters same and next spaces* around to complete the last decrease 16 spaces crochet the first part and join in the 2nd loop of the starting stitch slip_stitch in next space chain 1 16 single_crochet 4 *single_crochet in space chain 3* around join 16 spaces slip_stitch to the center of next space chain 1 16 single_crochet 5 *single_crochet in space chain 4* around join 16 spaces slip_stitch to the center of next space chain 1 8 single_crochet 6 *single_crochet in space chain 1 double_crochet x 5 times in next space chain 1* around 40 double_crochet join 48 spaces slip_stitch to the next double_crochet bp slip_stitch around double_crochet chain 4 counts as first bp double_crochet and ch1 space 40 bp double_crochet 7 *bp double_crochet around next double_crochet chain 1* around join in the 3rd loop of the 40 spaces starting stitch slip_stitch in next space chain 3 counts as first double_crochet in the cluster holding back the last loop crochet 3 double_crochet into the same space then 40 clusters 8 yarn over and pull through all loops on hook to complete the first 40 spaces cluster chain 2 *cluster in next
